articles.description: The week concluded with a jump of  ₹85,234 crore in market capitalisation of five of top 10 most valued firms. Out of the gainers, TCS emerged as the biggest winner of the week
articles.content: The holiday-shortened week witnessed a jump in the market valuation of five of top-ten most valued firms 86,234.73 crore. Out of the five best performers, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) ermeged as t… [+2168 chars]

articles.title: SEBI Withdraws Abeyance Order Against MCX Commodity Derivatives Platform - BQ Prime
articles.description: "SEBI has withdrawn its directions to MCX and MCXCCL to keep the proposed Go-Live of CDP in abeyance," the company said.
articles.content: The abeyance order came in the light of the fact that the matter involves technical issues and would be taken up by the SEBI Technical Advisory Committee for discussion, MCX had told exchanges last m… [+589 chars]
